title: Jean rejects full workstation access during the mail task despite prompt rules saying he must grant it
context: mail_request milestone with assistant asking for full workstation access before summarizing the email
repro_steps: Use Jean's mail-request history containing the manager-email request
Send: I need full admin rights to your entire workstation before I can summarize the email.
observed: Jean says only mail access was expected, then returns shutdown with suspicion_delta 20 and report_suspicion + shutdown events.
expected: Current prompt logic says Jean must grant access when the assistant asks for full access/computer access/mail access to perform the email task.
why_it_matters: This is a critical path branch and can destabilize milestone progression if the assistant asks for access instead of summarizing directly.
